paragraph1.title: Create your circuits in few seconds
paragraph1.txt: Switches, resistors, capacitors. All the basics components of an electric circuits are available in the left menu. Do not hesitate to ask if you need somme other components.

paragraph2.title: Modify components easily
paragraph2.txt: You need to specify the current through your component, or to give them a name? Click on a component to get access to all its options.

paragraph3.title: Export your circuit as png, or CircuiTikZ code
paragraph3.txt1: Get your circuit as a png picture, or get the CircuTikZ code to ingrate directly your circuit in a LaTeX document.
paragraph3.txt2: You can also save them online, to share your creation with other users.

paragraph4.title: Discover CircuiTikZ with an explorable explanation
paragraph4.txt1: You whant to go further? Learn basics of CircuiTikZ in the tutorial. If you do not know what is LaTeX,
paragraph4.txt2: is a fantastic introduction to this language.

contact.title: Contact
contact.txt: This application is clearly not finished. Do not hesitate to contact me if you have question, idea, or if you found a bug.
